revisionDesc.change: Finalized - This is good to go.
Add dummy header for original identifier 'papyri.info/ddbdp/sb;18;13308' pointing to new identifier 'papyri.info/ddbdp/p.cair.mich;3;8_2'
Vote - AcceptText - lin13 κώμῃ{ν}: better encode <:κώμῃ|reg|κώμην:>; it's a morphological error || lin28 εἰς μὲ, => εἴς με,

Vote - AcceptText - Looks ok. At end of i.2 use ca.3; in i.4 use ca.5; add square brackets to |reg| in i.8, ii.12, and ii.47; in i.9 it's [.9], remove comma in i.13; at end of i.14 there is no mark of abbreviation so why not ἑαυτ̣<ὸν>?; in i.16 use ca.5; I think the .3 in i.18 is an ellipsis and therefore superfluous; in i.24 use ca.6; ii.28 accent μέ; add angled brackets to regularization in ii.28; accent δὲ in ii.37; regularization in ii.38 needs nested |alt| tags; add number tags in ii.47; move the final period in ii.50 to after (?) and delete extra space before very last square bracket.
Submit - The text is entered according to the printed edition of P. Cair. Mich. III
Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - lin41 => ἐάν τέ τι <:συμβῇ|reg|συνβῇ:> μοι <:τελ[ευτῆσαι]=A. Papathomas, Tyche 25 (2010) 223|ed|τελ[ευτᾶν]:> [.?] (NB ἐάν, not ἐὰν)
Submit - Änderung des Inf. Präs. in Inf. Aor. (Z. 41) nach A. Papathomas, Tyche 25 (2010) 223.
Automated transfer of accents across reg-orig pairs
batch converted all tei:sic to tei:orig and tei:corr to tei:reg
changed schema; added xml:space=preserve; indented; moved title/@n to idno
Converted from TEI P4 (EpiDoc DTD v. 6) to P5 (EpiDoc RNG schema)
